resources.string:
Versailles has a rich history! 
The Palace of Versailles is iconic and attracts numerous visitors from all corners of the globe. 
 
Naturally, you want to see as much as possible in a short space of time. But there's little point in hurrying your visit without taking the time to get the most out of your trip. 
 
Here are some tips to help you prepare for your visit so it will always remain an unforgettable experience.
